posts.message:
qdbus org.kde.ksmserver /KSMServer org.kde.KSMServerInterface.logout [ShutdownConfirm] [ShutdownType] [ShutdownMode]

# logout
qdbus org.kde.ksmserver /KSMServer org.kde.KSMServerInterface.logout 0 0 3

# shutdown
qdbus org.kde.ksmserver /KSMServer org.kde.KSMServerInterface.logout 0 2 3

#reboot
qdbus org.kde.ksmserver /KSMServer org.kde.KSMServerInterface.logout 0 1 3
posts.author: Jonathan van Zuijlekom
